subject: Sports Injuries
Playoff Games
Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The team has adopted Tom Coughlin’s understated toughness to overcome injuries, and seemingly long odds, to remain in control of their playoff fate heading into Sunday night’s finale against Dallas.
